Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
eGenix Web Installer Test Package
---------------------------------

This is a test package for the eGenix Web Installer that comes with
the latest mxSetup module, the distutils/setuptools add-on we have
been using to distribute our packages since 2004. mxSetup.py is
included in in this package.

Automatic Binary Installation
-----------------------------

The test package will install mxDateTime using a source package which
dynamically downloads and runs a precompiled binary package for the
installation platform. mxDateTime uses a Python C extension, so
normally requires a working compiler environment for the installation.

The test package also supports fallback to the source package and
compilation using a compiler, in case no suitable binary package can
be found.

Downloads are safe, since the web installer verifies the downloads
before using them based on MD5, SHA1, SHA256 and size.

Note that the test package only includes the bare minimum to run the
web installer and provide meta-data to installers such as
easy_install, zc.buildout and pip. It does not include any binaries or
the source code of the package it is meant to install.

Compatibility
-------------

The test package should be compatible with:

* Python 2.5 - 2.7

* easy_install, pip and zc.buildout

* manual "python setup.py install"

* Windows, Linux, Mac OS X, FreeBSD

More documentation will follow as we make progress with the
web installer.

License
-------

This software is brought to you by eGenix.com and distributed under
the eGenix.com Public License 1.1.0.
